name: Lastseen
description:
This game was the result of a challenge I've made with my friends. They gave me a theme and my job was to make a game with that theme in under 24 hours. The theme was "Guide". So I made a game where you have to draw your own guides on the screen before everything goes dark.

Lastseen is a rage and precision platformer game. That means it's pretty hard and requires skill. It's not for everyones taste for sure.

Game currently has 3 levels but I'm planning to add more with future updates.

Controls

Arrow keys - Movement
Z - Jump
X - Dash

Credits

Misticloud - Programmer | Pixel artist

Music from OpenGameArt.org
Sound effects from freesound.org
